DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response rate time progression patient relapse refractory intermediate high grade non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma treat doxorubicin topotecan . - Determine toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive doxorubicin IV 5-10 minute day 1 topotecan IV 30 minute day 3-5 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 6 course absence disease progression . Patients follow every 6 month 2 year annually next 3 year .
